title: Lead Full Stack Developer
description: As a Full Stack Developer, I excel in planning, designing, developing, testing, and maintaining large-scale web applications from the ground up using modern frameworks such as React.js and Node.js. My expertise includes robust version control with Git and GitHub to ensure smooth and effective team collaboration. I am adept at implementing new features and modifications based on stakeholder requirements, and I prioritize comprehensive testing to maintain exceptional code quality.

title: Mern Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained a customer relationship management (CRM) system for small businesses, leveraging the MERN stack to provide a seamless user experience and efficient data management. Built reusable components and front-end libraries for future use, reducing development time for new projects by 15%. Integrated third-party services and APIs, including payment gateways and social media logins, expanding application functionality.

title: Software Developer Intern
description: Designed and developed a software that streamlines inventory management process for internal employees. Collaborated with other engineers on existing internal systems to implement feature enhancements and modifications.
